audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: End Users/Desktop

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Other Operating Systems :: BeOS

name: UberTuber

screenshots.caption: UberTuber playing back a clip from YouTube.

short_description:
UberTuber, designed for the Haiku operating system, grabs clips from various sites and opens them in your preferred media player while they're being downloaded. At this moment there is support for clips from:

YouTube, Google video, MetaCafe, DailyMotion, Yahoo video, Photobucket, DepositFiles, Vimeo, blip.tv Facebook video and Escapist magazine.

The actual work is done in the back-end, using the Python script "youtube-dl" which downloads the video file to your temporary folder.

UberTuber monitors the system clipboard for URLs pointing to the supported websites and automatically inserts them into its URL text field. 

I have removed the files for download. You can install UberTuber with HaikuDepot.
summary: UberTuber for Haiku plays back online videos with your media player.
